item.description:
Cardio Dance with Amy!

Tuesday Nights 6pm – 7pm

Wesley Hall at First United Methodist Church

57 Peters St. North Andover, MA 01845

(across from Panera, Burger King and Burton's Grill off 114 and 125) (map)

*MONTH OF DECEMBER SPECIAL: ALL STUDENTS ONLY $5/class!

If you like my Zumba Dance with Amy class, you’re gonna LOVE this one!

It’s got all the same easy-to-follow, calorie-torchin’, bootie shakin’ cardio of my regular Zumba class, but with slightly different moves and music giving it a more “pop radio” flair! Where a traditional Zumba class is 70% latin music, Dance Video Diva is only 30% latin with the rest consisting of your favorite songs from today’s top Pop charts and music videos with some old school 80′s and 90′s hits thrown in!

You’re gonna love it as you bring out your inner Diva and we dance our cares away together! Watch out MTV…here we come!

***OPEN TO THE PUBLIC***

$10 Walk-In Rate
4-Class-Card for only $32!

Please “Like” “ZumbaDancewithAmy” on Facebook for my best diet, exercise and motivational tips and class updates!

See complete schedule and more details at: www.amyfournierhealthandfitness.com

Thank You!

group.name: The Zumba Dance and Fitness Meetup Group

item.name: Cardio Dance with Amy
